title: Peaceful Beach Home Holiday for Couples and Families
description: Get away from it all and embrace some sand and surf with a trip to Sandcastles 1770 Resort. Nestled between the towns of 1770 and Agnes Water, Sandcastles 1770 is the perfect spot for a romantic retreat or family escape, with One-Bedroom and Two-Bedroom Beach Homes on offer, only steps away from one of Australiaâ€™s most pristine beaches. Or indulge in a bit of extra luxury and upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Beach Home with a private plunge pool for the ultimate relaxing beachside holiday. Includes a bottle of wine, fresh seasonal fruit and guaranteed 12pm late checkout.
offer_address: 40 Captain Cook Dr, Agnes Water QLD 4677

title: Great Barrier Reef Getaway with Pool Access Upgrades Available
description: Escape to coastal Queensland's best kept secret. Enjoy award-winning resort-style facilities with all the convenience of a self-contained apartment at Lagoons 1770 Resort & Spa. Perfect for a couples' getaway or family holiday with a surf beach and an idyllic bay within easy reach. Includes daily breakfast, indulgent cocktails, two AUD$25 vouchers for Anjea Day Spa, an AUD$25 credit for Plantation Restaurant and much more. For a truly unforgettable escape, upgrade to a studio or one-bedroom apartment with direct pool access!
offer_address: Cnr Beaches Village Circuit & Captain Cook Drive, Agnes Water/1770, QLD
